Here is the information about your country

Introduction to United States

The United States of America is in North America, bordered by Canada to the north, Mexico to the south, the Atlantic Ocean to the east, and the Pacific Ocean to the west. Notable features include the Rocky Mountains, the Mississippi River, and the Great Lakes.

Dive into key facts and figures that provide a well-rounded understanding of each nation at a glance

Climate

The United States has a diverse climate, ranging from arctic in Alaska to tropical in Hawaii and Florida, with temperate, continental, and semi-arid climates in between
